name: Silver Lining Institute of Education
briefDescription: An unique, visionary livelihood generating hospitality skill development training institution with state of art infrastructure. Students of low to medium educational profile, with financially challenged & socially deprived backgrounds, are privileged to get an opportunity to hone their skills at such an innovative training institution that provides most contemporary pedagogical methodology. We literally have started a new era for the ordinary guy or girl to achieve the most sought for success in a way unparallel at this moment, other than technical skill, good moral and ethical practices preached to make "Model Citizen". Giving value for money and time spent by all stakeholders. Till date more than 200 students are benefited.
